You can bind to properties on an HTML element's DOM instance, a [component](https://angular.dev/guide/templates/guide/components) instance, or a [directive](https://angular.dev/guide/templates/guide/directives) instance. ### [Native element properties](https://angular.dev/guide/templates/binding\#native-element-properties) Every HTML element has a corresponding DOM representation. You can bind to directive properties as well. ``` ``` check ### [Attributes](https://angular.dev/guide/templates/binding\#attributes) When you need to set HTML attributes that do not have corresponding DOM properties, such as ARIA attributes or SVG attributes, you can bind attributes to elements in your template with the `attr.` prefix. ```
